General.Name: Softlab S.p.A
General.Description: Softlab S.p.A. provides various business development services in Italy. It offers data analytics, GRC audit and security, TLC network management, digital sales and marketing, and RPA and customer services, as well as customized web, app, and network software development and testing services. The company was formerly known as Acotel Group S.p.A. and changed its name to Softlab S.p.A. in January 2021. The company is based in Rome, Italy. Softlab S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Softlab Holding s.r.l.
General.Address: Piazzale Konrad Adenauer, 3, Rome, RM, Italy, 00144
